name: Federal Regulatory Taxes
description:
This law is part of the federal tax code. The following taxes are included in this law: (1) Property Value Tax and (2) Pollution Tax. Each tax sends a notification and additional information can be found via the commands "!tax" and "/tax card". You can mute each individual notification by using it's code in a command: !PVOpt, !PTOpt. You can use the master toggles: !OptInAll and !OptOutAll to toggle all notifications on or off.

Regulatory taxes are indicated with the tag (REG) preceding the article name.

Parliament expressly authorizes the Minister of Infrastructure to manage, modify, and remove districts governed by this law as applicable.

Needs the following bank accounts for import: # Federal Pollution Tax Account

properties.Title: (REG) Property Tax
properties.UserDescription:
This article assesses a property tax on excess housing value. As housing values for professions range from 0 to 100, this tax does not start until housing value exceeds 110. This allows all professions to meet their housing requirement tax free with a small buffer. Housing values in excess of the 110 buffer charge a progressive tax based on the amount of housing value in excess of the 110. The tax amounts are as follows: (1) Housing Value between 0 and 110: tax-free, (2) Housing Value between 111-200: 0.33 e/hr x (housing value - 110), (3) Housing Value between 201-300: 0.4 e/hr x (housing value - 200) + (90HV x 0.33 e/hr), and (4) Housing Value exceeding 300: 0.5 e/hr x (housing value - 300) + (100HV x 0.4 e/hr) + (90HV x 0.33 e/hr).

Example Values: 110HV = 0 e/hr; 125HV = 5 e/hr; 150HV = 13 e/hr; 175HV = 21e/hr; 200HV = 30e/hr; 225HV = 40 e/hr; 250HV = 50 e/hr; 275HV = 60 e/hr; 300HV = 70 e/hr; 350HV = 95 e/hr.

Parliamentry values:
Housing Thresholds: 110, 200, 300
Tax amount per HV: 0.33, 0.4, 0.5 (respectively)
Timing: every hour

properties.Title: Property Tax Notification
properties.UserDescription: This article provides a toggle to mute the messages related to the property tax.

properties.Title: (REG) Pollution Tax
properties.UserDescription: A tax to limit excess air pollution. This tax charges a rate of 100 e / ppm.

properties.Message: You are subject to a pollution tax! The going rate is 100 euro per PPM. More information can be found on discord! To opt out of this message, please type !PTOpt - you may opt in again at any time by the same command.

properties.Title: Pollution Tax Notification
properties.UserDescription: Provides a toggle control for pollution tax notifications.

properties.Title: Master Toggle on for all Notification
properties.UserDescription: The article provides a master toggle, by command !OptInAll, to turn on all tax notifications.

properties.Title: Master Toggle Off for all Notification
properties.UserDescription: This article provides a master toggle, by command !OptOutAll, to turn off all tax notifications.

properties.Title: Query Tax
properties.UserDescription:
The Command !tax allows the citizen to check the tax liability information to see all taxes issued to the individual or company to give a more accurate tax liability for planning and pricing.

\\Implementation Notes: There's no way to separate the tax liability information for tracking accounts as far as I can tell unless we use arithmetic to add specific accounts together and not use "all taxes". This is flawed - because the banking regulations show up as taxes owed. In addition so do the tracking information. This would be best implemented by addition of the tax liabilities filtered by tax code.
